Package org.dellroad.hl7.llp

Class LLPOutputStream

java.lang.Object
org.dellroad.hl7.llp.LLPOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, HL7Writer
public class LLPOutputStream extends Object implements HL7Writer, Closeable
Writes out HL7 messages using the "lower layer protocol".

Instances are not thread safe.
